verses.verse: So Abijah <S%H29><s%> slept <S%H7901><s%> with his fathers, and they buried <S%H1><s%> him in the city <S%H6912><s%> of David, <S%H5892><s%> and his son <S%H1732><s%> Asa <S%H1121><s%> became <S%H609><s%> king <S%H4427><s%> in his place. <S%H4427><s%> The land <S%H8478><s%> was undisturbed <S%H776><s%> for ten <S%H8252><s%> years <S%H6235><s%> during his days. <S%H8141><s%>

And he built <S%H1129><s%> fortified <S%H4694><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> in Judah, <S%H3063><s%> since <S%H3588><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> was undisturbed, <S%H8252><s%> and there <S%H369><s%> was no <S%H369><s%> one <S%H369><s%> at war <S%H4421><s%> with him during those <S%H428><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had given <S%H5117><s%> him rest. <S%H5117><s%>

For he said <S%H559><s%> to Judah, <S%H3063><s%> "Let us build <S%H1129><s%> these <S%H428><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> and surround <S%H5437><s%> [them] with walls <S%H2346><s%> and towers, <S%H4026><s%> gates <S%H1817><s%> and bars. <S%H1280><s%> The land <S%H776><s%> is still <S%H5750><s%> ours, <S%H6440><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> we have sought <S%H1875><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God; <S%H430><s%> we have sought <S%H1875><s%> Him, and He has given <S%H5117><s%> us rest <S%H5117><s%> on every <S%H5439><s%> side. <S%H5439><s%>" So they built <S%H1129><s%> and prospered. <S%H6743><s%>

Now Asa <S%H609><s%> had <S%H1961><s%> an army <S%H2428><s%> of 300000 from Judah, <S%H3063><s%> bearing <S%H5375><s%> large <S%H6793><s%> shields <S%H6793><s%> and spears, <S%H7420><s%> and 280000 from Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%> bearing <S%H5375><s%> shields <S%H4043><s%> and wielding <S%H1869><s%> bows; <S%H7198><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> of them were valiant <S%H2428><s%> warriors. <S%H1368><s%>

Now Zerah <S%H2226><s%> the Ethiopian <S%H3569><s%> came <S%H3318><s%> out against <S%H413><s%> them with an army <S%H2428><s%> of a million <S%H505><s%> men and 300 chariots, <S%H4818><s%> and he came <S%H935><s%> to Mareshah. <S%H4762><s%>

So Asa <S%H609><s%> went <S%H3318><s%> out to meet <S%H6440><s%> him, and they drew <S%H6186><s%> up in battle <S%H4421><s%> formation <S%H6186><s%> in the valley <S%H1516><s%> of Zephathah <S%H6859><s%> at Mareshah. <S%H4762><s%>

Then Asa <S%H609><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> his God, <S%H430><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Lord, <S%H3068><s%> there <S%H369><s%> is no <S%H369><s%> one <S%H369><s%> besides <S%H5973><s%> Thee to help <S%H5826><s%> [in the battle] between <S%H996><s%> the powerful <S%H7227><s%> and those who have <S%H369><s%> no <S%H369><s%> strength; <S%H3581><s%> so help <S%H5826><s%> us, O Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God, <S%H430><s%> for we trust <S%H8172><s%> in Thee, and in Thy name <S%H8034><s%> have come <S%H935><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> multitude. <S%H1995><s%> O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> Thou art our God; <S%H430><s%> let not man <S%H582><s%> prevail <S%H6113><s%> against <S%H5973><s%> Thee."

So the Lord <S%H3068><s%> routed <S%H5062><s%> the Ethiopians <S%H3569><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Asa <S%H609><s%> and before <S%H6440><s%> Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and the Ethiopians <S%H3569><s%> fled. <S%H5127><s%>

And Asa <S%H609><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> who <S%H834><s%> [were] with him pursued <S%H7291><s%> them as far <S%H5704><s%> as Gerar; <S%H1642><s%> and so many Ethiopians <S%H3569><s%> fell <S%H5307><s%> that they could not recover, <S%H4241><s%> for they were shattered <S%H7665><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> and before <S%H6440><s%> His army. <S%H4264><s%> And they carried <S%H5375><s%> away very <S%H3966><s%> much <S%H7235><s%> plunder. <S%H7998><s%>

And they destroyed <S%H5221><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> Gerar, <S%H1642><s%> for the dread <S%H6343><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had fallen <S%H1961><s%> on them; and they despoiled <S%H962><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the cities, <S%H5892><s%> for there was much <S%H7227><s%> plunder <S%H961><s%> in them.

They also <S%H1571><s%> struck <S%H5221><s%> down <S%H5221><s%> those who owned <S%H168><s%> livestock, <S%H4735><s%> and they carried <S%H7617><s%> away large <S%H7230><s%> numbers <S%H7230><s%> of sheep <S%H6629><s%> and camels. <S%H1581><s%> Then they returned <S%H7725><s%> to Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>
